title: Regata OS 24: The Chameleon of Brazil’s Tech Landscape
description:
Regata OS 24, an openSUSE-based distro aimed at gamers, launches with Linux kernel 6.7, KDE Plasma 6, and Mesa 24. Here’s more on that!

The post Regata OS 24: The Chameleon of Brazil’s Tech Landscape appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Firefox 125 Enters Public Beta Testing With URL Paste Suggestion, PDF Highlighting
description:
With the Firefox 124 release out the door, Mozilla promoted the upcoming Firefox 125 release to the beta channel for public testing, so it’s time to take a first look at the new features and improvements.

The post Firefox 125 Enters Public Beta Testing With URL Paste Suggestion, PDF Highlighting appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Immich 1.99.0 Brings Upload Indicators, Optimizations & More
description:
Immich’s latest update introduces a sleek new logo, bug fixes, and performance improvements for web and mobile users.

The post Immich 1.99.0 Brings Upload Indicators, Optimizations & More appeared first on Linux Today.

title: DietPi Released a New Version 9.2
description:
DietPi is a lightweight Debian-based Linux distribution for SBCs and server systems, with the option to install desktop environments, too. It ships as minimal image but allows to install complete and ready-to-use software stacks with a set of console based shell dialogs and scripts. The project released the new version DietPi v9.2 on March 16th, […]

The post DietPi Released a New Version 9.2 appeared first on Linux Today.
